column4: So when i get 1104 installed all the way, what do you think the issue is?
It did it on 9.10, 10.4, and now 10.10.
Choppy scrolling of web pages and other scrolling things.
I use a geforce 6150 onboard and it runs fine. What is the system intended for?
which driver is the nvidia chip using?
ok can you pastebin the output of:  sudo lshw -C display; lsb_release -a; dpkg -l | grep nvidia
is it a PCI video card?
doesn't sem that way, seems to think it's a pci card
puppy will be great then, or you can use xpud ;)
any small size diro will fit. If you can get an 8Gb SD, you can run a full Ubuntu with ease
you'd want a persistant install which needs a bit more work
